H0.text: The town of Keswick in Cumbria lies just north of which body of water. Ullswater

H1.text: The town of Keswick in Cumbria lies just north of which body of water. Bassenthwaite Lake

H2.text: The town of Keswick in Cumbria lies just north of which body of water. Windermere

H3.text: The town of Keswick in Cumbria lies just north of which body of water. Derwentwater

A4.text: Derwentwater, or Derwent Water, is a lake in the Lake District in North West England, immediately south of Keswick.
